decoworld.util.png

Class PNGImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.util.png.PNGImage

  • public class PNGImage
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte[] IEND 
      static byte[] PNG_HEADER 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PNGImage(byte[] IHDRData, byte[] pixelData)
      Attempts to construct a representation of a PNG image with IHDRData as it's IHDR chunk's data section and pixelData is the raw pixel data.
      PNGImage(java.io.InputStream input)
      Attempts to read a PNG file from the current position in input.

      • PNGImage

        public PNGImage(byte[] IHDRData,
        byte[] pixelData)
         throws java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Attempts to construct a representation of a PNG image with IHDRData as it's IHDR chunk's data section and pixelData is the raw pixel data.
        Throws:
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException

    • Method Detail

      • addPixels

        public void addPixels(byte[] data)
        Add data to the raw pixel data. The caller is responsible for ensuring that the added pixels are valid according to the IHDR information.
